name: alternun-dapp-starter
description: Vertical slice starter for Alternun on Stellar using Soroban smart contracts. It includes minimal contracts for: - **GBT Minting** (accepts stablecoin, mints GBT, and routes funds to Treasury) - **Treasury** (splits incoming funds 50/30/20 to Projects/Recovery/Alternun) - **ATN Bonding Curve** (quotes and mints ATN against a reserve token) - **Project Vault** (locks GBT and accounts for positions; pGBT placeholder) - **Oracle Mock** (sets a gold price for testing)
